H0.text: Digs up food is the activity that the feathered feet of the ptarmigan are most helpful for, since a ptarmigan is a bird that has feathered feet.

H1.text: Walking in deep snow is the most helpful activity for the feathered feet of a ptarmigan.

H2.text: Climbs rocky cliffs is the activity for which a ptarmigan's feathered feet are most helpful.

H3.text: The feathers on the feet of the ptarmigan are most helpful when the bird runs under bushes.
